predicate.note: Frames file for 'massage' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Manipulation.

example.name: ah, that feels good
example.text: [Scot MacInnis, a masseur in Boulder, Colo.,]-1 had a scary experience while [*-1] massaging a man in a natural-foods supermarket as part of a store promotion.

example.name: not literal
example.text: His board members alone have pledged $800,000 and he-1 is just beginning [*-1] to massage local foundations and corporations.
